title: Sri Lanka could reach IMF staff level agreement in 4-5 weeks: Coomaraswamy
body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka could reach a staff level agreement as early as 4 to 5 weeks from now, ex-Central Bank Governor Indrajit Coomaraswamy who is an advisor to the government said.
It was a “distinct possibility” that a staff level agreement could be reached in the next few weeks, he told an online forum conducted by the central bank.
He said a drawdown of funds needed progress on debt restructuring.
A staff level agreement could increase confidence bring foreign investment into capital markets, encourage more exporter conversions and remmittances into official channels, he said.
